img_summary: The image depicts an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*, resembling a fruit with a yellow top and textured green base. Based on the preceding and following text, it is likely an ingredient used for crafting or gameplay progression. Similar items, such as the Celestial Pear and Tree Pearl, are categorized as rare or uncommon ingredients and are found in specific locations within the game world. This item may serve a similar purpose in the game's narrative or mechanics.
